channel.title: Model Question? For all you model makers (inv look)
channel.description:
When you're making an item inventory look do you also use Metasequoia? If not what program do you use? Like a ring in you're inventory?
Also how do you make it .dat or does it automatically make it .dat?
Is Metasequoia also hard for you guys or am I dumb and don't know how to use it =P
Thanks,

item.title: Model Question? For all you model makers (inv look)

item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Lol, yeah I never got the hang of recolouring.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

K thanks… =P I thought I just sucked as Metasequoia[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 11, 2008, 03:59:29 pm[/size][hr]Wait how do you get MrPs’ DATmaker? It doesnt even show in google. =O
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 11, 2008, 04:02:37 pm[/size][hr]NVm i got it MrP stands for MrPatatoHead =P thanks!

item.title: Model Question? For all you model makers (inv look)
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

You can use Metasequoia. You’d edit the drop model I think, and then use that as the INV model aswell as the drop model. To make it .dat format you’d need MrPs’ DATmaker. Metasequoia is quite hard, gets easier the longer the time you use it.

Read full topic
